message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with $19,000. Considering the value, I would like to propose $17,000.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $17,000 is close, but to make this work, I'd need to see $18,000. This is a fair offer considering the product's value.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts. Considering all factors, I would like to propose $16,000 for the product.
